remarks: Equality version of ~ pm2.61ii .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Jun-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Nov-2019.)
statement:
pm2.61iine.1 $e |- ( ( A =/= C /\ B =/= D ) -> ph ) $.
pm2.61iine.2 $e |- ( A = C -> ph ) $.
pm2.61iine.3 $e |- ( B = D -> ph ) $.
pm2.61iine $p |- ph $.
